mapper.select: SELECT A.* FROM rgdb."DbT4001JukyushaDaicho" AS A INNER JOIN ( SELECT rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shinseishoKanriNo" FROM rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho" WHERE rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."shoKisaiHokenshaNo" = #{証記載保険者番号} AND rgdb."DbT4101NinteiShinseiJoho"."hihokenshaNo"=#{被保険者番号} ) AS B ON A."shinseishoKanriNo"=B."shinseishoKanriNo" AND A."shichosonCode" =#{市町村コード} AND A."hihokenshaNo"=#{被保険者番号} ORDER BY A."ninteiYMD" limit 1
